text: *Ring*   *Ring*   Looks like my friend Guide is calling me!
We are hosting open mic nights for the record lable scout Boss. I know that it is your dream to form a band and share your art with the world, so I signed you up!
WHAT?! I can’t do that! You know that I will just freeze up and choke…
Relax, I know that you struggle with social anxiety. There are a few folks that have been performing the last few weeks that you may be able to learn from.
…I don’t really have a choice do I?
Nope. Come to the bar tomorrow, there is someone you have to meet…
